name: Dan Fogler's Retro Roll
description:
Control Movie Star Dan Fogler to jump through a variety of obstacles while running. Collect as many objects that you can along the way to increase your score.Squash the Mushrooms and Frogs for a 50 Point increase. Now with 4 Medals to Unlock in Game and Game Center Achievements !
Simple and Addictive GamePlay. Let’s Roll!

Post High Scores to Game Center, Twitter
@MrDanFogler, @Rapsmyinitials
